thread.title: Russian woman roasts her newborn baby in a sauna stove
thread.title_full: Russian woman roasts her newborn baby in a sauna stove

title: Russian woman roasts her newborn baby in a sauna stove
text: Share this article Share A source in the village said: 'A 34-year-old mother of three gave birth while her husband was fishing, and burned the child to death in the stove. 'She was afraid of losing her job and had told everyone that she had simply put on weight. 'She worked in the local orphanage.' Her enraged husband 'beat her up and called the police', said the source. The woman has been detained and is undergoing psychiatric tests, said police. Police said they had removed the charred bones of a child from the stove in the sauna, known as 'banya' in Russia. Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
